summary: ITEM 1. Business The Walt Disney Company, together with the subsidiaries through which businesses are conducted (the Company), is a diversified worldwide entertainment company with operations in three segments: Entertainment, Sports and Experiences. The terms “Company”, “we”, “our” and “us” are used in this report to refer collectively to the parent company and the subsidiaries through which businesses are conducted. ENTERTAINMENT The Entertainment segment generally encompasses the Company’s non-sports focused global film and episodic content production and distribution activities.
